body.name: LG 32MR50C-B 32-inch FHD Curved Monitor 100Hz, AMD FreeSync, OnScreen Control, Dynamic Action Sync, Black Stabilizer, Tilt Stand (HDMI), 2023
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 21 mins
body.description: The immersive, do-it-all screen for a big, home office upgrade. The large, 32” Full HD, curved display with 100Hz refresh rate and AMD FreeSync envelops you in your work and engages you while you stream. The large screen with a 3-side virtually borderless design and versatile connectivity options makes this monitor ideal for home office setup.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vivid Color with IPS and FHD Resolution At 1920x1080 resolution, LG's Full HD IPS Display features vibrant color and clarity even from wide viewing angles. Work through your projects with ease and efficiency.
100Hz Refresh Rate The quick 100Hz refresh rate assures streaming and even casual game play displays smoothly with reduced stuttering and motion blur.

Reader Mode Reader Mode adjusts color temperature and luminance, supporting a suitable viewing experience for reading on a monitor. Flicker Safe Flicker Safe reduces invisible flickering on the screen and helps to provide a comfortable working environment for long periods of screen time.

Previous page AMD FreeSync Gamers can experience seamless, fluid movement in high resolution and fast-paced games. Never In The Dark Black Stabilizer is your ally to attack or defend against enemies hiding in the shadows. Next page 1 AMD FreeSync 2 Black Stabilizer
Easier User Interface With OnScreen Control, you can customize the workspace by splitting the display or adjusting basic monitor options with just a few mouse clicks.
Easy and Comfortable The ergonomic stand makes it easy to flexibly adjust the tilt of the screen in the optimal position for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Performance at this Price Point!
reviews.reviewText: The LG 32MR50C-B 32-inch FHD Curved Monitor 100Hz offers excellent resolution especially at this price. Only negative is that it has only 1 HDMI input: That is a bit odd.SETUP:1) Disable and delete all the audio drivers associated with the monitor. In Windows 11 you can do this easily through Device Manager. They are easy to spot because they are marked "LG".2) Go to the LG website and download the "On Screen Control" App. Be careful to download the Windows version. Once you download and install, go into the App's settings and unselect "Start at Windows Startup" or words to that effect. There is absolutely NO NEED for the LG On Screen Control to start with Windows. When you want to make adjustments to the monitor, simple click the onscreen App and you're off an running.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING Quality for the Price, Pixels Visible Though at 1080p
reviews.reviewText: It's an amazing monitor for the price! 32 inches is a lot bigger than I anticipated! The monitor itself feels very high quality and has a nice menu to adjust the brightness and color settings. One small thing is that 32 inches may be too big for 1080p for some folks, at a couple feet from the monitor the pixels become noticeably visible, but if you have distance from the monitor it looks fine. Overall great monitor and quality, especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This monitor was perfect for all our needs. Good quality and performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is it
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’m glad I purchased this..it’s exactly what I needed!! Bold text and I just love everything about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor for the value, but only 1 HDMI port
reviews.reviewText: This is a great monitor, large, very clear display, nice contrast and stands true to the description with the refresh rate, flickering, etc. The only downfall (and what wasn't listed in the description) is that it only has one HDMI port. This is difficult if you want to connect multiple devices (PC and laptop; Switch and PC; etc.).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect budget gaming monitor
reviews.reviewText: This monitor is the greatest budget monitor I use it for gaming and it’s perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Issues with display
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two of these monitors at the same time from the same vendor. I got one on Sunday and one on Monday afternoon. No issues with the first one when I set it up Monday morning. Setup the second one on Monday late afternoon. I noticed issues with the display on the left and right side. Then saw same issue on the top left side. See pics. I requested a replacement and hope the new one does not have the same problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The monitors are okay as far as the picture goes. However, the design of the monitors is rather poor.1. The power is supplied by a VERY non-standard source. A crazy-looking plug goes in the wall, and if you use this with a power strip, you can expect that the plug will use one outlet, but cover up THREE more outlets. I have a three monitor setup, and I had to devote TWELVE plugs to these things. It's crazy.2. The monitors are not height-adjustable, just an FYI. And with my three-monitor setup, one monitor is lower than the other two. I'm going to have to find some cardboard or something to place the other monitor on to raise it up 1/4 inch or so.3. The power/adjustment button is a joystick on the back of the monitor, on near the bottom right. This is fine, except that if you have multiple monitors next to each other, then you have to move them out of the way of each other to reach that button.4. There are TWO HDMI ports on the back of the monitor, and one RGB port. I don't know of a reason to have two HDMI ports on a monitor. However I DO see the need for an HDMI and a Display Port. However, this monitor has no Display Port. There is also a headphone jack. On the monitor. Buried way in the back. I would wager this will never be used.Obviously this monitor was not actually field tested by anyone that designed it.I don't think that the quality of the picture is any better than any other monitor you can find on Amazon, and the design flaws are much more annoying than the picture quality is superior. I would not recommend buying these.
